casebody.data:
Angelo SYLVESTRO and Michele Fazzare, Appellants, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 7245. Circuit Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit. May 12, 1936. Garvin & Garvin, of Marquette, Mich., for appellants. Jos. M. Donnelly, U. S. Atty., of Grand Rapids, Mich.

Before MOORMAN, SIMONS, and ALLEN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The court being of opinion that no error prejudicial to the rights of appellants was committed on the trial of this cause, it is ordered that the judgments herein appealed from be affirmed.
